title: Feng Shui Calculator
description: Is the Feng Shui of this property good?
disclaimer: It's just for fun. Please don't take the results too seriously!
badFengShui: Bad Feng Shui (Major Adjustment or Remediation Needed)

door_mingtang.label: Bright hall in front of door (flat ground/pond/green grass)

door_unlucky_direction.label: Door facing west or northwest
door_unlucky_direction.advice: Consider adjusting the door orientation or adding barriers to improve air flow.

door_long_corridor.label: Door directly facing long corridor/street (piercing evil)
door_long_corridor.advice: Set up a screen or large plant inside the door to block and reduce direct air rush.

door_elevator.label: Door directly facing elevator
door_elevator.advice: Place round, large plants or screens at the door to cushion.

door_see_stove.label: Seeing stove when opening door
door_see_stove.advice: Use a screen or relocate the stove to avoid fire qi rushing towards the door.

door_see_toilet.label: Seeing toilet when opening door
door_see_toilet.advice: Set up a partition or adjust the door orientation to reduce filthy air entering the room.

door_see_mirror.label: Seeing mirror when opening door
door_see_mirror.advice: Adjust the mirror position so it doesn't directly reflect the view from the door.

entry_dark_messy.label: Dark and messy
entry_dark_messy.advice: Add lighting or rearrange to keep clean.

entry_sharp_corner_attack.label: Sharp corner attack/hidden arrow hurting chest
entry_sharp_corner_attack.advice: Use plants or screens to block sharp corner attacks.

entry_low_ceiling.label: Entryway too low or oppressive
entry_low_ceiling.advice: Redesign the ceiling or use light colors to enhance space feeling.

living_sofa_curve.label: Sofa arranged in curved shape to gather qi

living_sofa_back_water.label: Sofa backed by water or aquarium
living_sofa_back_water.advice: Adjust the sofa to back against solid wall or add screen for support.

living_sofa_face_door.label: Sofa directly facing door
living_sofa_face_door.advice: Adjust sofa angle or use partition to reduce evil qi.

living_direct_light.label: Overhead light shining directly on head
living_direct_light.advice: Relocate the light or use soft light shade.

living_isolated_column.label: Isolated column blocking air flow
living_isolated_column.advice: Enclose the column with furniture or attach landscape painting to resolve.

living_sharp_corner_unfixed.label: Sharp corner not resolved
living_sharp_corner_unfixed.advice: Place tall plants or set up screen at sharp corner to exorcise evil qi.

bed_child_east.label: Child's bed positioned east or southeast

bed_beam_press.label: Beam pressing on bed or air conditioner hanging over head
bed_beam_press.advice: Move bed or install ceiling to block beam pressure.

bed_face_west.label: Bed head facing west
bed_face_west.advice: Adjust bed head direction to avoid blood rushing to head.

bed_face_mirror.label: Bed facing mirror
bed_face_mirror.advice: Adjust mirror position or cover with cloth.

study_door_kitchen_toilet.label: Door facing kitchen/toilet
study_door_kitchen_toilet.advice: Adjust study door orientation or add screen to block water-fire conflict.

study_wall_toilet.label: Desk back or face wall of toilet
study_wall_toilet.advice: Move desk to avoid toilet wall.

kitchen_south.label: Kitchen facing south
kitchen_south.advice: Consider adjusting kitchen position or adding partition to reduce fire qi.

kitchen_stove_bad_facing.label: Stove directly facing door/bedroom/toilet
kitchen_stove_bad_facing.advice: Adjust stove position to avoid collision with door.

kitchen_stove_no_back.label: Stove without back support
kitchen_stove_no_back.advice: Add solid wall or cabinet to enhance stability and safety.

dining_round_square.label: Dining table is round or square

dining_sharp_table.label: Dining table is triangular or has sharp corners
dining_sharp_table.advice: Replace table with round or square to improve qi field.

dining_door_collision.label: Dining table directly hit by door/toilet
dining_door_collision.advice: Adjust table position or set up screen to resolve evil qi.

toilet_face_door.label: Toilet directly facing door
toilet_face_door.advice: Change door orientation or add partition to reduce filthy air spreading.

toilet_same_door_kitchen.label: Same door as kitchen
toilet_same_door_kitchen.advice: Change door or add partition to avoid water-fire collision.

house_dark_damp.label: Dark and damp
house_dark_damp.advice: Add windows or lighting devices, improve humidity and lighting.

house_no_airflow.label: Air doesn't flow
house_no_airflow.advice: Install ventilation system or open flow channels to enhance air movement.
